title: Mankind is altered: mirror game
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Jean-Marc Le Pechoux
brief_description: A tea-break tragedy. In a world generated and controlled by a computer, Echo meets Narcissus. Written by Bryan Dawe. Cast includes Deborah Coulls, Jeni Caffyn, Rob Scott, Graeme Stephen, Nico Hermence, Taya Straton.
